item.description:
Free screening of film, Food, Inc.,
with Discussion after
Jody Adams and Donald Wiest
with Annie B. Copps.

This is a fact-based review of agriculture. It is a positive, informative movie. While it does promote dairy, which is unfortunate (the primary contributor owns a dairy farm), it does also discuss many issues relevant in farming today.



Food, Inc. exposes America's industrialized food system and its effect on our environment, health, economy and workers' rights. Learn about these issues and take action through the Hungry For Change cafeteria and check out the 10 Simple Tips for making positive changes in your eating habits. Learn more about these issues and how you can take action on www.TakePart.com.

Here is the official Food, Inc. movie site where you can watch the trailer and get involved:
www.foodincmovie.com

The movie is now for sale on Amazon:
http://www.amazon.com...
item.name: Food, Inc. free screening & discussion
